trails.name: Ward Pound Ridge Reservation Trail
trails.overview: Ward Pound Ridge Reservation Trail is a 2.6 mile loop trail located near Pound Ridge, New York that features a great forest setting and is rated as moderate. The trail is primarily used for hiking, trail running, and camping and is accessible year-round. Dogs are also able to use this trail but must be kept on leash.

trails.name: Letchworth Finger Lakes Trail via Mount Morris Dam
trails.overview: Letchworth Finger Lakes Trail via Mount Morris Dam is a 18.1 mile moderately trafficked point-to-point trail located near Mt Morris, New York that features a lake and is rated as moderate. The trail offers a number of activity options and is accessible year-round. Dogs are also able to use this trail but must be kept on leash.

The trail is primarily used for hiking, walking, nature trips, and birding and is best used from March until October. Dogs are also able to use this trail but must be kept on leash.
